TOGGLE.HELP_TEXT: Set toggle to its default state

SUMMARY.TITLE: Form Summary
SUMMARY.SUBTITLE: Fill in the general form information.

UNPUBLISHED_MODAL.TITLE: Update unpublished form
UNPUBLISHED_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: If this form was previously published, changes made will only affect new requests.
UNPUBLISHED_MODAL.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to update the form?

PUBLISHED_MODAL.TITLE: Update published form
PUBLISHED_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: The form is already published. Changes made will only affect new requests.

FORMS.NOT_UPDATED: This request form is missing information and has not been updated.
FORMS.UNPUBLISH_SUCCESS: This form was succesfully unpublished! Requests submitted using this form have not been affected.

DUPLICATE.FILL_DETAILS: Fill in the details to create new form

DELETE.TITLE: Delete {status} form
DELETE.PUBLISHED_DESCRIPTION: This change is irreversible. Requests based on this form will not be deleted.
DELETE.UNPUBLISHED_DESCRIPTION: This change is irreversible. If the form was previously published, the change will not affect requests based on this form
DELETE.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this form?

NOTIFICATIONS.MISSING_INFO: Request missing information. Request is not submitted.

LEFT_PANEL.PROMPT: Select the form template to provide your requirements

FORM.FORM_TYPE_LABEL: Select type of form you need

CHANGE_FORM_ALERT.TITLE: Change Request Form
CHANGE_FORM_ALERT.DESCRIPTION: The new selection of form will discard the current form and will initiate the new form creation. Are you sure you want to change the form type?

BASIC_DETAILS.TITLE: Basic Information
BASIC_DETAILS.CAPTION: This section contains basic information about the request that helps the learning team organize and track requests.

ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.TITLE: Additional Information
ADDITIONAL_DETAILS.CAPTION: This section is used to provide additional information specific to this request, which is not included in the standard form.

FIELDS.OTHER_INFO_CAPTION: Are there any other considerations or context that we need to be aware of?
FIELDS.ADD_MORE_CAPTION: Is there more information you would like to provide for the training

REQUEST_DETAILS.TITLE: Request Details
REQUEST_DETAILS.CAPTION: This section describes what the request is about.  Please make sure to include details that will help the learning team to better understand the goals and requirements so they can assess the request in a timely manner.

FIELDS.REQUEST_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Enter details of challenges you are trying to solve

L_D_SECTION.TITLE: Internal Information
L_D_SECTION.CAPTION: In this section the request owners can record the initial assessment results and will help the learning team make the decision on the request and plan for next steps if needed.

TOP_BAR.APPROVE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Request “{requestNo}” has been successfully approved and requester is notified about change.
TOP_BAR.DECLINE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Request “{requestNo}” has been successfully declined and requester is notified about change.

CANCEL_PROJECT.BODY: Are you sure you want to cancel this project ?  Once you confirm you will not be able to resume the project, and its resources and budget will be released from the project.
